# Chocolatey-for-wine Chocolatey packagemanager automatic installer in wine, handy to install quickly programs in wine (and subsequently find bugs in wine ;) ) For some bugs workarounds are added like for Visual Studio Community 2022 and nodejs, see further on. As I was bored during lock-down I wrote a custom winetricks(.ps1) with verbs I find handy. Just do 'winetricks' to see them. For some verbs a full restart of wine is needed (due to recent wine changes). You'll see a messagebox and the session will be ended. Just start powershell again and retry the verb. If this is done once, it won't be needed anymore for any verb.

# Chocolatey-for-wine Automatyczny instalator mened≈ºera pakiet√≥w Chocolatey w wine, przydatny do szybkiego instalowania program√≥w w wine (i jednoczesnego wykrywania b≈Çƒôd√≥w w wine ;) ) Dla niekt√≥rych b≈Çƒôd√≥w dodano obej≈õcia, jak dla Visual Studio Community 2022 i nodejs, patrz dalej. Podczas lockdownu, z nud√≥w, napisa≈Çem w≈Çasny winetricks(.ps1) z poleceniami, kt√≥re uwa≈ºam za przydatne. Po prostu wpisz 'winetricks', aby je zobaczyƒá. Dla niekt√≥rych polece≈Ñ wymagany jest pe≈Çny restart wine (ze wzglƒôdu na ostatnie zmiany w wine). Pojawi siƒô okienko z komunikatem i sesja zostanie zako≈Ñczona. Wystarczy ponownie uruchomiƒá powershella i spr√≥bowaƒá ponownie wykonaƒá polecenie. Je≈õli zrobisz to raz, nie bƒôdzie to ju≈º wymagane dla ≈ºadnego polecenia.

Content:
Example:  

'winetricks vs22_interactiveinstaller'  ( --> session will be ended)  

do 'wine powershell'  

do 'winetricks vs22_interactiveinstaller'  


(BTW via 'winetricks vs22_interactive_installer' you can install select what to install via the Visual Studio 2022 installer; 'winetricks vs22_interactive_installer' now got me in ten minutes into the main program (selected Desktop development with C++)).

Install :
- Download and unzip the release zip-file and do 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5c.751.exe' (takes about a minute to complete)

Optional:
- Run the installer like 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5a.751.exe /s' , then the install files (like Powershell*.msi and dotnet48) are saved in 
  MyDocuments and they don't need to be downloaded again if you create a new prefix)
Optional:
- Run the installer like 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5a.751.exe /q' to prevent the automatic launch of the powershell window (so install only). 

Optional:
- Check if things went well: "choco install chromium" and  "start chrome.exe (--no-sandbox not needed anymore as of wine-8,4)" 

![Screenshot from 2022-08-26 12-31-18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26839562/186885380-d5a617c4-9cf4-4831-a475-2bd85a3b5784.png)
About PowerShell:

Tip: Chocolatey usually installs the latest version of a program, which might reveal new wine bugs. You might have more luck with an older version of the software.  
Example:  

choco search --exact microsoft-edge --all (--> list all versions)  

choco install microsoft-edge --version --version='135.0.3179.98'

General info:

- 'wine powershell.exe' starts the PowerShell-Core console.

 
About ConEmu:
Translation:
Przyk≈Çad:  

'winetricks vs22_interactiveinstaller'  ( --> sesja zostanie zako≈Ñczona)  

wykonaj 'wine powershell'  

wykonaj 'winetricks vs22_interactiveinstaller'  


(NA MARGINESIE przez 'winetricks vs22_interactive_installer' mo≈ºesz wybraƒá, co zainstalowaƒá poprzez instalator Visual Studio 2022; 'winetricks vs22_interactive_installer' uruchomi≈Ç mi po dziesiƒôciu minutach g≈Ç√≥wny program (wybrano Desktop development with C++)).

Instalacja :
- Pobierz i rozpakuj plik zip z wydaniem i wykonaj 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5c.751.exe' (zajmuje oko≈Ço minutƒô)

Opcjonalnie:
- Uruchom instalator jak 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5a.751.exe /s' , wtedy pliki instalacyjne (takie jak Powershell*.msi i dotnet48) zostanƒÖ zapisane w 
  Moje Dokumenty i nie bƒôdzie potrzeby ich ponownie pobieraƒá przy tworzeniu nowego prefixu)
Opcjonalnie:
- Uruchom instalator jak 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5a.751.exe /q', aby zapobiec automatycznemu uruchomieniu okna powershell (tylko instalacja). 

Opcjonalnie:
- Sprawd≈∫, czy wszystko posz≈Ço dobrze: "choco install chromium" oraz  "start chrome.exe (--no-sandbox nie jest ju≈º potrzebne od wine-8,4)" 

![Screenshot from 2022-08-26 12-31-18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26839562/186885380-d5a617c4-9cf4-4831-a475-2bd85a3b5784.png)
O PowerShell:

Wskaz√≥wka: Chocolatey zwykle instaluje najnowszƒÖ wersjƒô programu, co mo≈ºe ujawniƒá nowe b≈Çƒôdy wine. Byƒá mo≈ºe lepiej zadzia≈Ça starsza wersja oprogramowania.  
Przyk≈Çad:  

choco search --exact microsoft-edge --all (--> wy≈õwietl wszystkie wersje)  

choco install microsoft-edge --version --version='135.0.3179.98'

Informacje og√≥lne:

- 'wine powershell.exe' uruchamia konsolƒô PowerShell-Core.

 
O ConEmu:

Content:
ConEmu console suffers from a few wine-bugs:
  - Ctrl^C to quit a program that doesn't return to the console doesn`t work. Use Shift^Ctrl^C instead.
  - Selecting text in the ConEmu window (for copy/paste) doesn't highlight the selection. Included is a very sad hack       against recent wine versions that works around this, so highlighting should just work now.
   
About winetricks(.ps1):

- If you don't call it ('winetricks' in powershell-console) , nothing gets downloaded so no overhead there. 
- A lot of verbs (like powershell 5.1) need a few essential files to extract stuff from msu packages. Installing these essential files requires first huge downloads , and  takes lots of time during 1st time usage. But after things are cached it goes quickly . For example if you might wanna try 'winetricks ps51' first, it will take about  approx. 15 minutes. Some other verbs might take 5 minutes on first time usage. But after you called a verb once this nuisance is gone.
- Files are cached in directory MyDocuments. If you call all verbs it'll take about 800 MB there.
- Hopefully some better 64-bit support for various verbs.
- Possibility to extract a file and (try) install from an msu file. Do 'winetricks install_dll_from_msu' to see how.
- A rudimentary Powershell 5.1.
- experimental dotnet481 installation, and dotnet35 (might be needed by apps not satisfied with current dotnet48 installation).
- Autotab-completion. Note: while using multiple verbs from command line they have to be seperated by a comma
  from now on (this is how powershell handles multiple arguments)
  So 'winetricks riched20 gdiplus' won't work anymore, use 'winetricks riched20,gdiplus' instead
- Some programs fail to install/run when you try them via Chocolatey due to wine-bugs. I added a few workarounds in winetricks for them, see below.
- Special verbs (winetricks vs19, vs22 and vs22_interactive_installer) to install working Visual Studio Community 2019 and 2022 (see screenshot, >10 mins to install and requires approx. 10GB!, after install start devenv.exe from directory c:\Program\ Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\Common7\IDE/)
  ![screenshot](https://github.com/PietJankbal/Chocolatey-for-wine/assets/26839562/d576a619-c752-4eb1-81c2-6f6b66b50ff6)
- Special verb to get access to various unix commands like grep,sed, file, less, curl etc. etc. (winetricks git.portable, Disclaimer: some commands do not yet work due to wine bugs
- Also included a few powershell scripts adapted from codesnippets found on the internet:
    - How to embed an exe in a powershell script via Invoke-ReflectivePEInjection (the exe won't show up in tasklist).
    - How to make fancy messageboxes
    - Convert a powershell script (ps1) into an exe.
    - And a few other
 
     
About system programs:

Feature is added to replace simple system programs like for example setx.exe by a function in
c:\\Program Files\Powershell\7\profile.ps1. Or add system programs that are missing like getmac.exe.
If programs fail because of insufficient mature or missing system programs one could write a 
function to return whatever the program expects. 
Like in profile.ps1 I added (amongst others) a wmic.exe that supports a bit more options,
and a basic setx.exe.
Or you could just manipulate the arguments passed to the system program. See profile.ps1 and choc_install.ps1.
No garantuee this works for more complex programs as well... 
 
Notes:
Translation:
Konsola ConEmu cierpi z powodu kilku b≈Çƒôd√≥w wine:
  - Ctrl^C do zako≈Ñczenia programu, kt√≥ry nie wraca do konsoli, nie dzia≈Ça. U≈ºyj Shift^Ctrl^C zamiast tego.
  - Wybieranie tekstu w oknie ConEmu (do kopiowania/wklejania) nie pod≈õwietla zaznaczenia. Do≈ÇƒÖczony jest bardzo smutny hack przeciwko najnowszym wersjom wine, kt√≥ry to omija, wiƒôc pod≈õwietlanie powinno ju≈º dzia≈Çaƒá.
   
O winetricks(.ps1):

- Je≈õli nie wywo≈Çujesz go ('winetricks' w konsoli powershell), nic nie zostaje pobrane, wiƒôc nie ma ≈ºadnych obciƒÖ≈ºe≈Ñ.
- Wiele komend (jak powershell 5.1) wymaga kilku podstawowych plik√≥w do rozpakowania danych z pakiet√≥w msu. Instalacja tych plik√≥w wymaga najpierw ogromnych pobra≈Ñ i zajmuje du≈ºo czasu przy pierwszym u≈ºyciu. Po zcache‚Äôowaniu wszystko dzia≈Ça szybko. Na przyk≈Çad je≈õli chcesz wypr√≥bowaƒá 'winetricks ps51' najpierw, zajmie to oko≈Ço 15 minut. Niekt√≥re inne komendy mogƒÖ zajƒÖƒá 5 minut przy pierwszym u≈ºyciu. Po jednorazowym wywo≈Çaniu komendy ten problem znika.
- Pliki sƒÖ cache'owane w katalogu Moje Dokumenty. Je≈õli wywo≈Çasz wszystkie komendy, zajmie to oko≈Ço 800 MB.
- Miejmy nadziejƒô, ≈ºe pojawi siƒô lepsze wsparcie 64-bitowe dla r√≥≈ºnych komend.
- Mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá wyodrƒôbnienia pliku i (pr√≥by) instalacji z pliku msu. Wykonaj 'winetricks install_dll_from_msu', aby zobaczyƒá jak.
- Podstawowy Powershell 5.1.
- Eksperymentalna instalacja dotnet481 oraz dotnet35 (mo≈ºe byƒá potrzebna przez aplikacje, kt√≥re nie sƒÖ zadowolone z obecnej instalacji dotnet48).
- Automatyczne uzupe≈Çnianie zak≈Çadek. Uwaga: podczas u≈ºywania wielu komend z linii polece≈Ñ muszƒÖ byƒá oddzielone przecinkiem
  od teraz (tak powershell obs≈Çuguje wiele argument√≥w)
  Wiƒôc 'winetricks riched20 gdiplus' nie bƒôdzie ju≈º dzia≈Çaƒá, u≈ºyj 'winetricks riched20,gdiplus' zamiast tego
- Niekt√≥re programy nie udaje siƒô zainstalowaƒá/uruchomiƒá przez Chocolatey z powodu b≈Çƒôd√≥w wine. Doda≈Çem kilka obej≈õƒá w winetricks dla nich, zobacz poni≈ºej.
- Specjalne komendy (winetricks vs19, vs22 oraz vs22_interactive_installer) do instalacji dzia≈ÇajƒÖcego Visual Studio Community 2019 i 2022 (patrz zrzut ekranu, >10 min instalacja i wymaga ok. 10GB!, po instalacji uruchom devenv.exe z katalogu c:\Program\ Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\Common7\IDE/)
  ![zrzut ekranu](https://github.com/PietJankbal/Chocolatey-for-wine/assets/26839562/d576a619-c752-4eb1-81c2-6f6b66b50ff6)
- Specjalna komenda do uzyskania dostƒôpu do r√≥≈ºnych polece≈Ñ unixowych, jak grep, sed, file, less, curl itd. (winetricks git.portable, Uwaga: niekt√≥re polecenia jeszcze nie dzia≈ÇajƒÖ z powodu b≈Çƒôd√≥w wine
- Do≈ÇƒÖczono te≈º kilka skrypt√≥w powershell dostosowanych z fragment√≥w kodu znalezionych w internecie:
    - Jak osadziƒá exe w skrypcie powershell przez Invoke-ReflectivePEInjection (exe nie pojawi siƒô w tasklist).
    - Jak zrobiƒá efektowne okna komunikat√≥w
    - Konwersja skryptu powershell (ps1) na exe.
    - I kilka innych
 
     
O programach systemowych:

Dodano funkcjƒô zastƒôpowania prostych program√≥w systemowych, jak np. setx.exe, funkcjƒÖ w
c:\\Program Files\Powershell\7\profile.ps1. Lub dodawania brakujƒÖcych program√≥w systemowych, jak getmac.exe.
Je≈õli programy nie dzia≈ÇajƒÖ przez zbyt ma≈Ço dojrza≈Çe lub brakujƒÖce programy systemowe, mo≈ºna napisaƒá
funkcjƒô zwracajƒÖcƒÖ to, czego program oczekuje.
Jak w profile.ps1 doda≈Çem (miƒôdzy innymi) wmic.exe z obs≈ÇugƒÖ trochƒô wiƒôkszej liczby opcji,
i podstawowy setx.exe.
Mo≈ºesz te≈º po prostu manipulowaƒá argumentami przekazywanymi do programu systemowego. Zobacz profile.ps1 i choc_install.ps1.
Nie gwarantujƒô, ≈ºe to dzia≈Ça r√≥wnie≈º dla bardziej z≈Ço≈ºonych program√≥w...
 
Uwagi:

RowTranslations.originContent: - Some programs fail to install/run when you try them via Chocolatey due to wine-bugs. I added a few workarounds in winetricks for them, see below.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Niekt√≥re programy nie udaje siƒô zainstalowaƒá/uruchomiƒá przez Chocolatey z powodu b≈Çƒôd√≥w wine. Doda≈Çem kilka obej≈õƒá w winetricks dla nich, zobacz poni≈ºej.

RowTranslations.originContent: - Special verbs (winetricks vs19, vs22 and vs22_interactive_installer) to install working Visual Studio Community 2019 and 2022 (see screenshot, >10 mins to install and requires approx. 10GB!, after install start devenv.exe from directory c:\Program\ Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\Common7\IDE/)
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Specjalne komendy (winetricks vs19, vs22 oraz vs22_interactive_installer) do instalacji dzia≈ÇajƒÖcego Visual Studio Community 2019 i 2022 (patrz zrzut ekranu, >10 min instalacja i wymaga ok. 10GB!, po instalacji uruchom devenv.exe z katalogu c:\Program\ Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\Common7\IDE/)

RowTranslations.originContent: - Special verb to get access to various unix commands like grep,sed, file, less, curl etc. etc. (winetricks git.portable, Disclaimer: some commands do not yet work due to wine bugs
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Specjalna komenda do uzyskania dostƒôpu do r√≥≈ºnych polece≈Ñ unixowych, jak grep, sed, file, less, curl itd. (winetricks git.portable, Uwaga: niekt√≥re polecenia jeszcze nie dzia≈ÇajƒÖ z powodu b≈Çƒôd√≥w wine

RowTranslations.originContent: - How to embed an exe in a powershell script via Invoke-ReflectivePEInjection (the exe won't show up in tasklist).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Jak osadziƒá exe w skrypcie powershell przez Invoke-ReflectivePEInjection (exe nie pojawi siƒô w tasklist).

RowTranslations.originContent: - Convert a powershell script (ps1) into an exe.
Feature is added to replace simple system programs like for example setx.exe by a function in
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Dodano funkcjƒô zastƒôpowania prostych program√≥w systemowych, jak np. setx.exe, funkcjƒÖ w

RowTranslations.originContent: c:\\Program Files\Powershell\7\profile.ps1. Or add system programs that are missing like getmac.exe.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: c:\\Program Files\Powershell\7\profile.ps1. Lub dodawania brakujƒÖcych program√≥w systemowych, jak getmac.exe.

RowTranslations.originContent: If programs fail because of insufficient mature or missing system programs one could write a
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Je≈õli programy nie dzia≈ÇajƒÖ przez zbyt ma≈Ço dojrza≈Çe lub brakujƒÖce programy systemowe, mo≈ºna napisaƒá

RowTranslations.originContent: function to return whatever the program expects.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: funkcjƒô zwracajƒÖcƒÖ to, czego program oczekuje.

RowTranslations.originContent: Like in profile.ps1 I added (amongst others) a wmic.exe that supports a bit more options,
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Jak w profile.ps1 doda≈Çem (miƒôdzy innymi) wmic.exe z obs≈ÇugƒÖ trochƒô wiƒôkszej liczby opcji,

RowTranslations.originContent: Or you could just manipulate the arguments passed to the system program. See profile.ps1 and choc_install.ps1.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Mo≈ºesz te≈º po prostu manipulowaƒá argumentami przekazywanymi do programu systemowego. Zobacz profile.ps1 i choc_install.ps1.

RowTranslations.originContent: No garantuee this works for more complex programs as well...
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Nie gwarantujƒô, ≈ºe to dzia≈Ça r√≥wnie≈º dla bardziej z≈Ço≈ºonych program√≥w...

Content:
- Do NOT use on existing wineprefix, only on fresh new created prefix! The installer just stupidly installs dotnet48 itsself and messes with registrykeys.
    If you have any dotnet version already installed with regular winetricks.sh, it will likely fail, and even if it succeeds, you'll likely end up with a broken prefix.
    If you need to install stuff with regular winetricks.sh for programs, do NOT use any of the dotnet* verbs. 
    BTW 'Arial' and 'd3dcompiler_47' verbs are already installed by default.
  - WINEARCH=win32 is _not_ supported!
  - Updating from a previous version is for now not (yet) supported, maybe later

Compile:
  - If you want to compile yourself instead of downloading binaries: see compilation instructions in mainv1.c and installer.c 
  - Then copy choc_install.ps1 into the same directory
  - Then do 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5a.735.exe'
Translation:
- NIE u≈ºywaj na istniejƒÖcym wineprefix, tylko na ≈õwie≈ºo utworzonym! Instalator po prostu g≈Çupio instaluje dotnet48 samodzielnie i miesza w kluczach rejestru.
    Je≈õli masz ju≈º zainstalowanƒÖ jakƒÖkolwiek wersjƒô dotnet za pomocƒÖ zwyk≈Çego winetricks.sh, prawdopodobnie instalacja siƒô nie powiedzie, a nawet je≈õli siƒô uda, najprawdopodobniej sko≈Ñczysz z uszkodzonym prefiksem.
    Je≈õli musisz instalowaƒá rzeczy za pomocƒÖ zwyk≈Çego winetricks.sh dla program√≥w, NIE u≈ºywaj ≈ºadnych polece≈Ñ dotnet*.
    BTW polecenia 'Arial' i 'd3dcompiler_47' sƒÖ ju≈º domy≈õlnie zainstalowane.
  - WINEARCH=win32 NIE jest obs≈Çugiwany!
  - Aktualizacja z poprzedniej wersji nie jest (jeszcze) obs≈Çugiwana, mo≈ºe p√≥≈∫niej

Kompilacja:
  - Je≈õli chcesz samodzielnie skompilowaƒá zamiast pobieraƒá binaria: zobacz instrukcje kompilacji w mainv1.c i installer.c
  - Nastƒôpnie skopiuj choc_install.ps1 do tego samego katalogu
  - Nastƒôpnie wykonaj 'wine ChoCinstaller_0.5a.735.exe'
